name: The Tale of Marena's Deft
description:
How to play:
- Use arrow keys to navigate the screen. 

- Press Z to fire magic blasts. 

- The blasts can bounce the sun around or make Dukljana drop the sun if she tries to drag it off the screen. 

- You also can bounce the sun just by touching it. 

- Don't let Dukljana steal the sun and avoid her deadly spears! 

- Your magic blasts can't hurt her directly, but you can deal damage by deflecting her spears back at her with the sun. 

- Or alternativly you can simply wait till her stamina runs out.

You are Marena, the spirit of death. You have spent many nights chasing a demon-queen Dukljana the Deathless, climbing to the very heights of Mount Troyan. If you can't stop her, she will steal the sun itself and who knows what will happen to the world then! Inspired by Touhou games (especially the early ones) and Slavic folk mythology.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 274.
